title: Looking for active club
body:
I play only normal and rotating modes...

I noticed recently alot of icons are rewarded to premade teams, I'd like to join one.

replies.body: howdy, if you add me ill happily invite you, we are still growing about 12 members last time i checked but usually have people on, then more that join the more that will be on :)

Hello Canc, 

We have a discord, if you struggle to find anyone on the boards : https://discord.gg/3zGt6Ya
